titles.title: Food Security Improvement Act of 1987
A bill to revise the basis for computation of emergency compensation under the 1986 feed grains programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices
committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

bill.summary: 1/20/1987--Introduced. Food Security Improvement Act of 1987 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to revise the computation basis for feed grain emergency compensation.
